The '''Localised Reincarnation Explosion''' is one of the powerful techniques utilised by [[Toneri Ōtsutsuki]].

== Usage ==
Toneri focuses his [[Tenseigan Chakra Mode|chakra cloak]] into one hand and creates a green orb that passes through the target's body, absorbing their [[chakra]] and leaving them unconscious. This attack was able to reach the [[moon]]'s surface, creating an explosion and causing massive damage to the moon, which resulted in a formation of large [[Wikipedia:Meteoroid|meteoroids]] moving towards Earth. This technique was also able to engulf [[Naruto]]'s [[Rasengan]]. 

== Trivia ==
* This technique's name was first revealed in ''[[Naruto: Shinobi Collection]]'', a Japanese social game available for iOS and Android phones on the GREE mobile social gaming platform.
